channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: More than 1 in 3 Americans have a side hustle, but they’re spending that extra cash right away. Financial experts say that’s the wrong approach.
item.description: Time is the ultimate luxury. Why are young people spending it driving for Uber if that doesn’t even get them ahead financially?

item.title: Thursday was a historically strange day in the stock market. That may be good news
item.description: The Russell 2000 small-cap index jumped more than 3% on Thursday, but every one of the so-called "Magnficient 7" stocks fell.

item.title: Dow ends higher, S&P 500 and Nasdaq pause rally as small-cap stocks outperform
The U.S. just got its best inflation report in over 3 years, but stocks are still down. Here’s why
item.description: “Is the market down? Or is this the most extreme rotation that we've ever seen out of everything that people have been hiding in?” Bancreek Capital Advisors’s Eric Pachman asked.

item.title: Bitcoin could be heading for a 'summer of 2021 style' correction between record highs, data shows
item.description: Bitcoin is not expected to retest its record until later in the year, but data shows this correction could get uglier before a recovery begins.

item.title: How the ‘Trump trade’ is taking over the bond market
Forget big tech stocks, the ‘Other 493’ are set for a comeback says BofA
item.description: "Growth is broadening out and so should the market."

item.title: Delta says the Olympics will cost it $100 million as travelers skip Paris
item.description: Delta says travelers are opting for other destinations or booking outside of the dates of the Olympic Games.

item.title: Here's how much Costco membership prices have risen since the 1980s
Magic Johnson tells young athletes the secret to staying ahead: Get a manager
item.description: Sports pros have a short window to build wealth and without proper help, they can go broke fast

item.title: Tesla shares close down 8% after report of robotaxi unveiling delay
item.description: Tesla is reportedly pushing back the unveiling of its self-driving taxi to October from August.

item.title: The CPI signaled inflation is slowing, but the Fed wants even more proof
Why the new Olympic gymnastics leotards are $3k each—and have a record number of crystals
item.description: During the 2024 Paris Olympic Games, U.S. gymnasts will wear custom garments adorned with up to 10,000 Swarovski crystals.

item.title: 10 states with America's worst infrastructure, and most to gain from billions in federal dollars
item.description: The U.S. government infrastructure spending boom is the biggest since the New Deal, and these ten states need all the help they can get.

item.title: It's shaping up to be Big Tech's worst day in two years by this metric
